title: Wholemeal, Oat and Banana Pancakes
ingredients: ['80g rolled oats', '120g wholemeal flour', '100g plain flour', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons dried powdered milk', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '500ml milk', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 banana, mashed']
